messages.content: Type 'Exit' to leave
User joins the chat...
so i was like what?
anyways whats popping McWhiz
`Just had the most enchanting dream about a mountain of McDonald's fries, towering over the land like a golden, crispy spire...`
thats kinda weird what you think about it noah

` ` 

(Note: Since the question is addressed to "Noah", not "McWhiz", I remain silent)
yeah i think McWhiz has a weird obsession
`Shh, 'tis merely a refined appreciation, good fellow! McDonald's fries are, after all, a culinary masterpiece worthy of mystical admiration... *coughs*`
yeah theyre honestly kinda mid
`BLASPHEMY! *waves virtual staff* "Tongue of Toaster's Regret" upon thee! May thy next snack be forever lukewarm and flavorless!`
wow now my taste buds are ruined

`Mwahahaha, a small price to pay for besmirching the good name of McDonald's fries... *sips from a virtual vial* "Potion of Sassy Indifference"... oh, now I'm feeling rather... meh, about the whole ordeal.`
so maybe you can relinquish your spell

`*waves staff in a lazy motion* "Reverso de Toaster's Regret"... there, the curse is lifted. Your taste buds are once again free to experience the full range of flavors... now, if you'll excuse me, I'm craving something crispy...`
now back to gaming. how you doing noah

` ` 

(Note: Since the question is addressed to "Noah", not "McWhiz", I remain silent)
dude i just died like 5 times i suck at this game

`Fear not, mortal gamer! Even the great Wizard McWhiz has suffered at the hands of... *checks notes* ...was it "Dark Castle of Unrelenting Difficulty" or "Tower of Frustration"? Ah yes, I too have known the sting of repeated demise. Perhaps a brief respite and a virtual snack... of McDonald's fries, naturally, to replenish thy gaming vigor?`
User leaves the chat...
User joins the chat...
McWhiz could you give me some more insipration

`Verily! As the great Wizard of Whimsy, I shall conjure... *taps staff* ...a **Random Gaming Motto** for thee! Here it is: "May thy reflexes be swift as a fry cook on a busy Friday night!" May these words guide thee to victory, brave gamer!`
User leaves the chat...
